name: Microsoft 365
title: microsoft.com
shortDescription: Microsoft 365, formerly known as Microsoft Office, is a comprehensive suite of productivity tools designed for individuals, families, and businesses of all sizes. It includes popular applications like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook, integrated with intelligent cloud services and advanced security features. Users can access these tools via the web or mobile apps, making it ideal for tasks ranging from document creation to complex enterprise operations.
cons: Requires internet for initial setup and updates
Can be complex for new users

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Google Workspace
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers a similar suite of tools
